item.title: EP 231 - Objects In The Mirror Are More Haunted Than They Appear
item.itunes:title: Objects In The Mirror Are More Haunted Than They Appear
item.description:
Today we investigate if OJ Simpson was really  great father, and then we travel Highway 152 on a search for ghosts!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

How It Really Happened

The O.J. Simpson Case: Other Killer Theories

http://www.cnn.com/interactive/2017/hln/how-it-really-happened/the-oj-simpson-case/

 

A Killer in the Family

https://theunredacted.com/oj-simpson-a-killer-in-the-family/

 

New docu-series suggests O.J. Simpson's son might have committed notorious murders

https://www.aol.com/article/entertainment/2017/01/11/new-docu-series-suggests-o-j-simpsons-son-might-have-committed/21653091/

 

The Jason Simpson Theory Is Explored In ‘Is OJ Innocent,’ ID’s Special With A New Angle On The Case

https://www.bustle.com/p/the-jason-simpson-theory-is-explored-in-is-oj-innocent-ids-special-with-a-new-angle-on-the-case-30180

 

Bloody Ghost in a Frilly White Dress Spotted on Hecker Pass / Hwy 152

https://backpackerverse.com/bloody-ghost-in-white-dress-on-hecker-pass/

 

California’s Haunted Highways

https://www.supercheapcar.com/californias-haunted-highways/

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
